dataset_id: GPM Ground Validation Global Flood Monitoring System (GFMS) Flood Maps IFloodS V1
organizations: Global Hydrology Resource Center, Marshall Space Flight Center, NASA
title: GPM Ground Validation Global Flood Monitoring System (GFMS) Flood Maps IFloodS V1
summary: The GPM Ground Validation Global Flood Monitoring System (GFMS) Flood Maps IFloodS dataset contains global flood estimates on a 0.25 degree spatial resolution every 3 hours, from March 26, 2013 through June 30, 2013. These data are provided in support of the Iowa Flood Studies (IFloodS) experiment conducted in eastern Iowa. The goals of the IFloodS campaign were to collect detailed measurements of precipitation at the Earth’s surface using ground instruments and advanced weather radars and to simultaneously collect data from satellites passing overhead. The data are available in netCDF-4 and ASCII formats. Flood map and rain graph files are available in KMZ, JPG, and GIF formats.
